title: FPS DROPS - POSSIBLE SOLUTION
body: I've been having the same problems as a lot of you; 15-20 minutes into the game, my FPS is cut way down and only fixed (temporarily) upon restarting the game. I've been using the new rooster ward since it came out, I tried switching back to another ward skin and the FPS problems are gone. I've only tried one game like this but everything was perfect. Will try more soon.

replies.body: I do not use the rooster ward, but I have had fps drops here and there. Next time it happens I will have to see if anyone else has the rooster ward. I feel like the fps drops lasted as long as the duration of a freshly placed ward before it becomes stealth-ed, but I can not confirm this 100% yet.

I can confirm that the not using the rooster ward has stopped the FPS drop for me. After doing everything on the FPS issues guide, I was still getting FPS drop. I am using the default ward on summoners rift and I have no issues now. 
Thanks

Thanks for posting this up. We've had other players mention their FPS issues in-game were also affected by the new *Crest of the Rooster* ward skin. Does this only happen in specific game modes or have you noticed it across the board when using the new ward skin?
